an10.96:2.3: kvettha → ko’ttha (bj); ko tettha (si); kvattha (pts1ed, mr)
an10.96:14.1: diṭṭhi → diṭṭhigatā (sabbattha) | yāvatā diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ diṭṭhiadhiṭṭhānaṁ diṭṭhipariyuṭṭhānaṁ diṭṭhisamuṭṭhānaṁ diṭṭhisamugghāto → yāvatā diṭṭhiṭṭhānā adhiṭṭhānaṁ pariyuṭṭhānaṁ samugghāto (sya-all); yāvatā diṭṭhiṭṭhāna adhiṭṭhāna pariyuṭṭhāna samuṭṭhāna samugghāto (pts1ed)
